subject: Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
Marathon Running
Boston Marathon
lead_paragraph: Lelisa Desisa’s victory in the 2013 Boston Marathon became a footnote to a horrific afternoon, but his response to the bombings resonated widely.
snippet: Lelisa Desisa’s victory in the 2013 Boston Marathon became a footnote to a horrific afternoon, but his response to the bombings resonated widely.
